Coordination fit Information
MRS. MADGE LAW
Office Manager
September 22, 1960
Mr. William G. Harley
Dupont Circle Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Your official announcement of the NAEB Washington Office
is happily received. I rubbed my finger over the printing
and found it to be quality. Everything seems to be in
apple pie order. As far as I am concerned, you might
touch the horses with the tip of the whip and get the buggy
rolling.
For the past several months I have been in contact with
Representative Colrner of Mississippi and have been pressing
him to take a stand in our behalf on the Rules Committee
of which he is a member. I have brought considerable
pressure to this part of the country to bear upon him and
feel that during the next session we may be able to change
his vote. Please know that my services are at your com¬
mand in this common cause we are representing.
With kindest personal regards, I am
Sincerely yours,
Raymond D. Hurlbert
General Manager
RDH/ml
enc.
P.S. I will see you in the Muir Woods.
The nation’s first educational television network with programs originated by University of Alabama, Auburn University, and Birmingham
Area Educational Television Association
